title: Breaking Down Shortened MLB Draft & Advantage of a Rule Change in the CBA
itunes:title: Breaking Down Shortened MLB Draft & Advantage of a Rule Change in the CBA
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode. To start off, the guys break down the upcoming shortened MLB Draft and the challenges that come from it (3:22). Next, the pair look at a new rule change in the CBA and the hidden advantage from the change (14:32). To wrap up the show, DJ and Bucky answer a few fan questions, which were left in the reviews (24:18).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
